dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3625 IH: To prohibit the allocation of funds to the National Endowment for Democracy.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Crane introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit the allocation of funds to the National Endowment for Democracy.

section.header: Prohibition on the allocation of funds to the National Endowment for Democracy

subsection.text: The head of an agency may not allocate any funds to the National Endowment for Democracy.
In this section the term agency has the meaning given that term in section 551 of title 5, United States Code.
